topic: Frameworks for identifying connections between disparate ideas in the energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can illuminate hidden connections and themes, enhancing understanding and potentially leading to innovative solutions. As a next step, I will systematically shuffle a set of my existing prompts and analyze the new combinations for emergent patterns or insights. This exercise will inform whether a structured methodology can be developed to harness these connections for complex problem-solving.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
